definition: since the dawn of time/from the year dot
to neglect/to skip (class or work)/to waste (time)/vast/loose-fitting
never before in the whole of history (idiom)/unprecedented

sentences.english: That was part of the secret of the gay genius.

sentences.english: The long-time- lasted debating is normal, also is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 這場曠古持久的爭論是正常的，也是必然的。
